decisions.title: Implement Command Fail-Safes in Existing Structure
decisions.description: Implemented command fail-safe mechanisms within the existing framework structure rather than creating new directories, enhancing validation.yaml and AI_INSTRUCTIONS.md with detailed command implementation patterns and adding implementation guides to command YAML files.

decisions.title: Implement Command Templates in Operation YAML Files
decisions.description: Enhanced existing operation YAML files with command template sections that define required components, validation rules, and implementation instructions for each command, ensuring consistent and complete command implementations.

decisions.title: Implement Comprehensive Testing for Command Fail-Safe Mechanisms
decisions.description: Developed a comprehensive testing approach for command fail-safe mechanisms, including test case files, framework files for testing, test environment setup, and testing methodology to ensure the robustness and effectiveness of the fail-safe mechanisms.
